mapper.insert: insert into Photos (id, Pilot_ID, Photo_Path, Photo_Filename, Photo_Ext, Photo_Size, Create_Time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pilotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update Photos set Pilot_ID = #{pilotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Photo_Path = #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo_Filename = #{photoFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo_Ext = #{photoExt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo_Size = #{photoSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Pilot_ID, Photo_Path, Photo_Filename, Photo_Ext, Photo_Size, Create_Time from Photos
